attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson from the office of Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
The British public, now more than ever, need a competent leader who stands for fairness, honesty and integrity.
Boris Johnson has so far proved that he is unfit to lead this country and the electorate deserves better. 
This petition will hopefully send a message to those at the top that Boris Johnson has passed his sell-by-date. He embarrasses us as a nation and he does not display the characteristics or actions of a decent Brit. His removal is necessary for the progress of the country.
attributes.background:
UK Parliament need to hear the British public – we want change.
Whether it be calling for a vote of no confidence, or whether there is any other Parliamentary intervention that will see the UK rid of our current Prime Minister, MPs need to act now in the interest of all their constituents.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
